srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/52/Cowboys_Stadium_full_view.jpg/405px-Cowboys_Stadium_full_view.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/52/Cowboys_Stadium_full_view.jpg/540px-Cowboys_Stadium_full_view.jpg 2x" width="180"/>\n           </a>\n          </div>\n         </div>\n         <div class="gallerytext">\n          <p>\n           <a href="/wiki/AT%26T_Stadium" title="AT&amp;T Stadium">\n            AT&amp;T Stadium\n           </a>\n           , home of the\n           <a href="/wiki/Dallas_Cowboys" title="Dallas Cowboys">\n            Dallas Cowboys\n           </a>\n          </p>\n         </div>\n        </div>\n       </li>\n       <li class="gallerybox" style="width: 162px">\n        <div style="width: 162px">\n         <div class="thumb" style="width: 160px;">\n          <div style="margin:0px auto;">\n           <a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Spurs_vs._Lakers.jpg">\n            <img alt="" data-file-height="1704" data-file-width="2272" height="120" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/17/Spurs_vs._Lakers.jpg/240px-Spurs_vs._Lakers.jpg" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/17/Spurs_vs._Lakers.jpg/360px-Spurs_vs._Lakers.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/17/Spurs_vs._Lakers.jpg/480px-Spurs_vs._Lakers.jpg 2x" width="160"/>\n           </a>\n          </div>\n         </div>\n         <div class="gallerytext">\n          <p>\n           Playoff game between the\n           <a href="/wiki/San_Antonio_Spurs" title="San Antonio Spurs">\n            San Antonio Spurs\n           </a>\n           and the\n           <a href="/wiki/Los_Angeles_Lakers" title="Los Angeles Lakers">\n            Los Angeles Lakers\n           </a>\n           in 2007\n          </p>\n         </div>\n        </div>\n       </li>\n       <li class="gallerybox" style="width: 152px">\n        <div style="width: 152px">\n         <div class="thumb" style="width: 150px;">\n          <div style="margin:0px auto;">\n           <a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Rangers_Ballpark_in_Arlington.jpg">\n            <img alt="" data-file-height="2400" data-file-width="3000" height="120" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/bd/Rangers_Ballpark_in_Arlington.jpg/225px-Rangers_Ballpark_in_Arlington.jpg" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/bd/Rangers_Ballpark_in_Arlington.jpg/338px-Rangers_Ballpark_in_Arlington.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/bd/Rangers_Ballpark_in_Arlington.jpg/450px-Rangers_Ballpark_in_Arlington.jpg 2x" width="150"/>\n           </a>\n          </div>\n         </div>\n         <div class="gallerytext">\n          <p>\n           The\n           <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Ballpark_in_Arlington" title="Ballpark in Arlington">\n            Ballpark in Arlington\n           </a>\n           , home of the\n           <a href="/wiki/Texas_Rangers_(baseball)" title="Texas Rangers (baseball)">\n            Texas Rangers\n           </a>\n          </p>\n         </div>\n        </div>\n       </li>\n       <li class="gallerybox" style="width: 162px">\n        <div style="width: 162px">\n         <div class="thumb" style="width: 160px;">\n          <div style="margin:0px auto;">\n           <a class="image" href="/wiki/File:BBVA_Compass_Stadium_Inaugural_Goal_Celebration.jpg">\n            <img alt="" data-file-height="3456" data-file-width="4608" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5a/BBVA_Compass_Stadium_Inaugural_Goal_Celebration.jpg/360px-BBVA_Compass_Stadium_Inaugural_Goal_Celebration.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5a/BBVA_Compass_Stadium_Inaugural_Goal_Celebration.jpg/480px-BBVA_Compass_Stadium_Inaugural_Goal_Celebration.jpg 2x" width="160"/>\n           </a>\n          </div>\n         </div>\n         <div class="gallerytext">\n          <p>\n           <a href="/wiki/BBVA_Compass_Stadium" title="BBVA Compass Stadium">\n            BBVA Compass Stadium\n           </a>\n           , home of the\n           <a href="/wiki/Houston_Dynamo" title="Houston Dynamo">\n            Houston Dynamo\n           </a>\n          </p>\n         </div>\n        </div>\n       </li>\n      </ul>\n      <h2>\n       <span class="mw-headline" id="See_also">\n        See also\n       </span>\n      </h2>\n      <div aria-label="Portals" class="noprint portal plainlist tright" role="navigation" style="margin:0.5em 0 0.5em 1em;border:solid #aaa 1px">\n       <ul style="display:table;box-sizing:border-box;padding:0.1em;max-width:175px;background:#f9f9f9;font-size:85%;line-height:110%;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold">\n        <li style="display:table-row">\n         <span style="display:table-cell;padding:0.2em;vertical-align:middle;text-align:center">\n          <img alt="flag" class="noviewer thumbborder" data-file-height="720" data-file-width="1080" height="21" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/f7/Flag_of_Texas.svg/32px-Flag_of_Texas.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/f7/Flag_of_Texas.svg/48px-Flag_of_Texas.svg.png 1.5x, military installations in Texas\n        </a>\n       </li>\n      </ul>\n      <h2>\n       <span class="mw-headline" id="Notes">\n        Notes\n       </span>\n      </h2>\n      <div class="reflist" style="list-style-type: decimal;">\n       <div class="mw-references-wrap">\n        <ol class="references">\n         <li id="cite_note-13">\n          <span class="mw-cite-backlink">\n           <b>\n            <a href="#cite_ref-13">\n             ^\n            </a>\n           </b>\n          </span>\n          <span class="reference-text">\n           For example, as used by the large\n           <a href="/wiki/Grand_Prairie,_Texas" title="Grand Prairie, Texas">\n            Grand Prairie\n           </a>\n           \xe2\x80\x93based national and international amusement park operator\n           <a href="/wiki/Six_Flags" title="Six Flags">\n            Six Flags\n           </a>\n          </span>\n         </li>\n        </ol>\n       </div>\n      </div>\n      <div class="reflist" style="list-style-type: lower-alpha;">\n       <div class="mw-references-wrap">\n        <ol class="references">\n         <li    a\n              </b>\n             </i>\n            </sup>\n           </a>\n           <a href="#cite_ref-Elector_156-1">\n            <sup>\n             <i>\n              <b>\n               b\n              </b>\n             </i>\n            </sup>\n           </a>\n           <a href="#cite_ref-Elector_156-2">\n            <sup>\n             <i>\n              <b>\n               c\n              </b>\n             </i>\n            </sup>\n           </a>\n          </span>\n          <span class="reference-text">\n           Did not run and was not a candidate, but received one electoral vote by a\n           <a href="/wiki/Faithless_elector" title="Faithless elector">\n            faithless elector\n           </a>\n           .\n          </span>\n         </li>\n         "\n                <a href="/wiki/Six_flags_over_Texas" title="Six flags over Texas">\n                 Six flags over Texas\n                </a>\n                "\n               </div>\n              </th>\n             </tr>\n             <tr>\n              <td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" colspan="2" style="width:100%;padding:0px">\n               <div style="padding:0em
